column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH:------ At about 8 pm on 27 September 2019 a gunman fired into Green cafe and restaurant
column4: located along street 150 in Phnom Penhâ€™s Tuol Kork district.------Initial reports said three shots were fired at the store breaking the glass door
column5: but no one was hurt. The gunman climbed into a Highlander and escaped.------UPDATE: Police are now hunting two Chinese men believed to be behind the shooting.------Authorities immediately went to the scene to interview staff and check security camera footage. ------POST NEWS
